\textbf{In this chapter}, you will learn to graph the data, so we can understand the data used to answer the RQ.
You will learn to:

\begin{itemize}
  \item
  select the appropriate graphic to graphically summarise data.
  \item
  graphically summarise data using quality, appropriate graphs.
  \item
  interpret graphs.
  \item
  identify badly prepared graphics, giving reasons.
\end{itemize}
